snippet: Franklin D. Roosevelt III, the president’s grandson, has endorsed Bill de Blasio, the left-leaning Democrat, while Theodore Roosevelt IV, a great-grandson of the president, is aiding Joseph J. Lhota, a Republican.
abstract: Trailside blog; New York City's mayoral race has divided descendants of Presidents Franklin D Roosevelt and Theodore Roosevelt; Franklin D Roosevelt III has endorsed left-leaning Democrat Bill de Blasio, while Theodore Roosevelt IV is aiding Republican Joseph J Lhota.
lead_paragraph: Franklin D. Roosevelt III, the president’s grandson, has endorsed Bill de Blasio, the left-leaning Democrat, while Theodore Roosevelt IV, a great-grandson of the president, is aiding Joseph J. Lhota, a Republican.

headline.main: A Split in Allegiances Among Roosevelt Scions
headline.print_headline:
A Split in Allegiances
Among Roosevelt Scions
